alert.note: Alert for Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 5:36AM EDT until July 18 at 6:48AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by upstream dam release is on Lake Winnipesaukee Lakeport Dam ongoing. * WHERE...A portion of central New Hampshire, including the following counties, Belknap and Merrimack. * WHEN...Until 200 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Some minor basement flooding or property inundation is possible. Please move personal items away from floodwaters and report damages to local officials. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 527 AM EDT, The New Hampshire Dam Bureau reported water rises on the Winnipesaukee River due an upstream floodgate release at the Lakeport Dam. - Tilton, Northfield, Franklin, and the Silver Lake area are the most likely place to experience minor flooding.
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
